## Events.BlockDelete class

Notifies listeners when a block (or connected stack of blocks) is deleted.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BlockDelete extends BlockBase 
```
**Extends:** [BlockBase](./blockly.events.blockbase.md)

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [ids?](./blockly.events.blockdelete.ids.md) |  | string\[\] | _(Optional)_ All of the IDs of deleted blocks. |
|  [oldJson?](./blockly.events.blockdelete.oldjson.md) |  | [blocks.State](./blockly.serialization.blocks.state.md) | _(Optional)_ The JSON respresentation of the deleted block(s). |
|  [oldXml?](./blockly.events.blockdelete.oldxml.md) |  | Element \| DocumentFragment | _(Optional)_ The XML representation of the deleted block(s). |
|  [type](./blockly.events.blockdelete.type.md) |  | EventType |  |
|  [wasShadow?](./blockly.events.blockdelete.wasshadow.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ True if the deleted block was a shadow block, false otherwise. |
